name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Demarini Zenith Drop 13 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a top-tier choice for players seeking a balanced swing feel and exceptional performance on the field. This bat is certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, & WBSC, ensuring it meets the highest standards for competitive play. Its standout features include a one-piece composite construction with a DX1 Alloy Barrel, offering high strength and durability. The 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter is paired with a distinctive purple and pink colorway, making it as stylish as it is powerful. The Big D End Cap effectively absorbs vibrations, enhancing player comfort and control with every swing. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
